properties.name: addGroupingCriteria
properties.description: Add the field to the groupingColumnsModel.

properties.name: removeGroupingCriteria
properties.description: Remove the field from to groupingColumnsModel.

properties.name: setGroupingColumnsModel
properties.description: Sets the columns to use as grouping criteria.

properties.name: setGroupingCriteriaIndex
properties.description: Sets the grouping index of a grouping criteria.
